channel.title: NPR All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Ari Shapiro, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.

item.title: Los Angeles immigration raid protests update
item.description: Members of the California National Guard have arrived in downtown Los Angeles. President Trump ordered 2,000 Guard troops to be deployed following protests in the LA area over raids by ICE.

item.title: CEO is charged after a journalist's home is vandalized
item.description: A CEO was charged after a journalist's home is vandalized after reporting on the CEO's alleged misconduct.

item.title: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass on protests
item.description: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass talks with NPR's Scott Detrow about President Trump sending National Guard troops to Los Angeles in response to anti-ICE protests.

item.title: Trump orders in National Guard to curb LA protests over immigration raids
item.description: President Trump federalized the National Guard to curb protests over immigration raids in Los Angeles.

item.title: Union leader detained at ICE raid in Los Angeles
item.description: Service Employees International Union California leader David Huerta was injured in a scuffle with federal agents. Sandra Diaz, vice president of SEIU-USWW California, talks with NPR's Scott Detrow.

item.title: How to build your own air filter for wildfire smoke
item.description: Air quality can be impacted by smoke from wildfires. Our reporter set out to build an air filter â€” in a style the EPA praised, using only things she already had at home.

item.title: What's the secret to actually making a good movie remake?
item.description: Remakes are as old as cinema itself. Why do they get so much love ... and hate?

item.title: In a crowded New Jersey governor primary, the state could see a party shift this fall
item.description: New Jersey holds primaries Tuesday in the race for governor, where President Trump has already jumped in with an endorsement. The state has a Democratic governor but could see a shift this fall.

item.title: Chile's Indigenous fishermen say the salmon industry threatens their way of life
item.description: Salmon farming is big business in Chile, and the U.S. is one of its largest markets. Yet the fish are not native, and fishermen say salmon are damaging ecosystems and an Indigenous way of life.

item.title: 78th Tony Awards preview: What to expect on Broadway's biggest night
item.description: 78th Tony Awards preview: What to expect on Broadway's biggest night
